ValidationRule.description: Fields must be filled in for vob to be completed status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "completed") && (ISPICKVAL( Insurance_Status__c, "") || ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c, "") || ISPICKVAL( Renews_On__c, "") || ISBLANK( Coverage_Start_Date__c) || ISBLANK( Coverage_End_Date__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot complete the VOB until the following fields are entered: 1. Representative Name 2. Reference# 3. Insurance Status 4. Plan Type 5. Renewal Type 6. Coverage Start Date 7. Coverage End Date
